summary: The implementation successfully applies Vijaya Children's Clinic branding to public-facing pages with comprehensive color scheme updates, doctor credentials display, service icons, contact information, and Tamil/English taglines. Staff portal functionality is preserved. However, there is one backend modification that violates constraints, and evidence of service icons in actual implementation is unclear from truncated files.

missing_requirements.requirement: Extract and use the Vijaya Children's Clinic logo from IMG-20260221-WA0006.jpg
missing_requirements.reason: While the logo is referenced in multiple files (SiteHeader.tsx, LandingPage.tsx) using '/assets/generated/vijaya-logo.dim_200x200.png', there is no evidence in the diff of the actual image extraction or generation from the source image IMG-20260221-WA0006.jpg. The diff shows usage of the logo but not its creation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Display services with colorful circular icons matching the uploaded image design
missing_requirements.reason: Service icon image paths are referenced in LandingPage.tsx (service-newborn, service-vaccination, etc.), but the file is truncated and does not show the complete implementation of how these icons are displayed. Cannot confirm if circular icons with matching colors are properly rendered.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend Motoko actor (main.mo) was modified with include statements and structure changes
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states 'Do not modify backend logic or data models' and 'Non-goals: Modifying the backend Motoko actor'. However, backend/main.mo shows modifications including new include statements (MixinStorage, MixinAuthorization) and structural changes to the actor definition.

hallucinated_features.description: QR code image added to clinic details
hallucinated_features.reason: ClinicDetailsSection.tsx includes a QR code image ('/assets/generated/vijaya-clinic-qr.dim_512x512.png') that was not mentioned in any requirement or image requirements list. This appears to be an addition beyond the requested branding updates.
